result.adr_address: 1/F, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 1/F, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: Spring Moon 嘉麟樓

reviews.text:
🌟Michelin Cantonese restaurant at The Peninsula Hong Kong. 
Great dim sum selections and all were prepared in traditional Cantonese style but with different kinds of premium ingredients.  Black truffles, pork from Hungary, lobster from Sicily...... so special and MUST TRY.

Service is professional and attentive, I never had to refill my tea. (Basic but not many restaurant actually succeed to do so) 

I’d love to comeback for dinner soon!

This is the most beautiful restaurant for good local food.   Service is impeccable along with the food and tea. Great place for families and also someone dinning alone. Well taken care of.  Wheelchair and stroller accessible and high chairs available
Best Chinese restaurant in the world.  Unparalleled service, inventive cuisine and a nostalgic atmosphere.  Had my wedding reception here also.
Crews are very kind and every dish is great. Little bit expensive, but really worth it.
Great service, super mindful of dietary restrictions.

result.formatted_address: 1/F, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, 香港
result.name: Spring Moon 嘉麟樓

reviews.text:
夕食で利用。
dress codeがあり主人はロングパンツをお借りして入店しました。
少量食べたかったのでスープとビーフン、デザートを注文。
どれも良い味わいでした。
ゆったりと食事できる雰囲気です。

【燒味涼菜拼盤】
叉燒，涼拌海蜇，叉燒

叉燒皮薄脆甜，調味沒有過人之處，部位於胸，口感較差。

海蜇比起一般切絲海蜇皮明顯不同，大朵完整，口感好，調味一般。

叉燒為此盤當中之最，醬汁甜稠，口感潤，黏，綿，調味具特色，相當相當好吃。

【松茸竹笙燉螺頭】
老機雞湯底，濃郁無油，竹笙爽脆，好喝，其餘配料不值一提。

【野菌頭抽煎班柳】
簡單說就是炸魚配煎野菇，魚肉不柴也不嫩，口感較一般，麵衣偏濕，此菜一般。

【蟲草花蒸滑雞】
雞肉三塊，結實但是相當嫩，很特別，不像是純雞腿或是低溫烹調的嫩，而是像經過某種醃製法做出來的，調味就像是醬油乾煎，這道好吃。

【乾鮑荷葉飯】
裹腹用的，不值一提。

【楊枝甘露】
裡頭是柚子跟芒果，整體表現一般，不如去外面吃個聰嫂。

【奶皇流沙包】
好吃，但是也非獨一無二，台中倒掉的天天見麵做的就有95%像了，佳麟樓的皮更薄而已。

【芋頭】
一絕，外層麵衣似冰晶，觸之即碎，內層麵衣薄脆不濕，內餡為肥豬肉丁燉芋泥，一口咬下，口感豐富，口味極佳，相當好吃的一道點心。

【蝦餃】
蝦子脆甜，調味樸實，簡單好吃。

🌟Michelin Cantonese restaurant at The Peninsula Hong Kong. 
Great dim sum selections and all were prepared in traditional Cantonese style but with different kinds of premium ingredients.  Black truffles, pork from Hungary, lobster from Sicily...... so special and MUST TRY.

Service is professional and attentive, I never had to refill my tea. (Basic but not many restaurant actually succeed to do so) 

I’d love to comeback for dinner soon!

This is the most beautiful restaurant for good local food.   Service is impeccable along with the food and tea. Great place for families and also someone dinning alone. Well taken care of.  Wheelchair and stroller accessible and high chairs available

跟老公慶祝生日 
選擇了嘉麟樓
環境很好👍👍 服務態度一流👍👍
食物質素整體👌可以
只是龍蝦球有點不爽口

result.vicinity: 1/F, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsui

result.adr_address: Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: The Peninsula Hong Kong

html_attributions: Blue Mango Works Marketing, Production and Events

reviews.text: Let’s say you definitely pay for the experience as well as the name. As for the hotel, it was an amazing experience. Great room, great service, great location. Tea was another story. I’m vegetarian so they had to change the menu which was... interesting. Bread with cheese. Felt like I was in middle school and forgot to bring my lunch again. The helicopter experience on the other hand was an amazing experience. One I’ll never forget! This, to me, is a must when you visit Hong Kong.
Very much embedding the spirit of 5 stars hotel. I loved my short weekend in this hotel. Wonderful view on the harbour.
Iconic establishment.  Most amazing decor and dining experiences.  The ride from the airport in a Rolls-Royce phantom was pretty special.

If you are looking for one of the best hotels in Hong Kong, you are on the right place. Clean rooms, big rooms and beds, excellent hotel staff. All 5 stars deserved indeed!!! If you want Rolls Royce ride... No problem! Just perfect vacation in Hong Kong!

The service here was impeccable...our high tea was bit of a hit and a miss. Some of the food wasnt very flavorful and felt a bit dried out as they were prepared hours beforehand. The facilities were very clean and the high tea is great for wet day timetable or just to hide from the heat.

result.adr_address: 香港尖沙咀梳士巴利道
result.formatted_address: 香港尖沙咀梳士巴利道
result.name: 半島酒店

html_attributions: Blue Mango Works Marketing, Production and Events

reviews.text: 5⭐️hotel

Let’s say you definitely pay for the experience as well as the name. As for the hotel, it was an amazing experience. Great room, great service, great location. Tea was another story. I’m vegetarian so they had to change the menu which was... interesting. Bread with cheese. Felt like I was in middle school and forgot to bring my lunch again. The helicopter experience on the other hand was an amazing experience. One I’ll never forget! This, to me, is a must when you visit Hong Kong.
